subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=髟06}}

# {{ja-def|髷}} [[bun]] (hairstyle); [[chignon]]; [[topknot]], a historical Japanese hair style often seen at [[samurai|Samurai]]s. Nowadays, it is seen as the hairstyle of [[sumo|Sumo]] wrestlers, [[maiko|Maiko]] or [[geiko|Geiko]], or wedding hair style of [[bride]]s.
